version_description: • New match day live blog feature!

• Updated pick team functionality
• Bug fixes
• Bug fixes & interface improvements
• Bug fixes & interface improvements

• Broadcast Schedules
• Match highlights
• Premier League Kicks Heroes
• Push notification updates
• General bug fixes
• Push notification updates
Bug fixes.
Club links and bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Minor improvements and bug fixes.
Fix bug updating postponed fixtures.

Accessibility and Voiceover improvements

Fixes issue with fantasy scores in player profile screen in double gameweeks.

Minor bug fixes.

Enables some user analytics by demographic groups. If you want to opt out of this you can enable "Limit Ad Tracking" in the main Settings app under Privacy->Advertising and this will apply across other apps too. Our full privacy policy is available at: https://www.premierleague.com/privacy-policy.

Fixes bug where the bottom of news articles could sometimes be unreachable when they contain an embedded tweet.

Minor changes.
Indicates availability of live streams in the USA.
Fix occasional crashes. One crash was triggered on logout and the other could happen on other login status changes.
Improve final gameweek handling in Fantasy
Cadbury added as the Premier League’s Official Snack Partner.
Bug fixes and improvements.
Preparations to make the app ready for 2017/18 season data.
This is Premier League - 2016/17 Season Review

2017/18 season switchover.

Promotion of FPL Draft within the Fantasy section - a new game for the 2017/18 season.
This is Premier League - 2016/17 Season Review

Fantasy Premier League is back and it’s better than ever! Select your squad for the 2017/18 season now.

Fix iOS 8 crash opening certain screens.

Other fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements

New in this update:
-‘Free Hit’ chip in Fantasy
-Adjusted ‘More’ navigation
-Ability to sync fixtures to your calendar
 
Update also fixes:
-Login issues reported
-Minor issues reported within Fantasy
-Playback of AD videos
Fix issue with Twitter sign in.
Fixes PL2 and U18 tables.

• Referee and officials info added to match centre
• Minor homescreen adjustments

- FPL performance updates
- General stability improvements

Let us know if you have any feedback on app@premierleague.com

- Updates to news section
- General bug fixes

New - Player Comparison in the Stats Centre allows you to compare player statistics from any season and see who comes out on top.

This update also includes:
 - Fix for intermittent crashing issue
 - Match Centre enhancements
 - Article swipe next / previous improvements

To give you more control over your data, we have made several changes. These include:
 - Creating a new Settings area for managing your personal details, email preferences and notifications
 - Resetting your notifications. Go to Settings to switch these back on
 - Providing clear messaging around the data we use and information on our privacy policies

Let us know if you have any feedback via app@premierleague.com

To give you more control over your data, we have made several changes. These include:

- Creating a new Settings area for managing your personal details, email preferences and notifications
- Resetting your notifications. Go to Settings to switch these back on
- Providing clear messaging around the data we use and information on our privacy policies
- Making minor changes to the onboarding process

Let us know if you have any feedback via app@premierleague.com

We look ahead to the 2018/19 season by introducing Wolverhampton Wanderers, Cardiff City and Fulham into the app.

This is Premier League 2017/18 has also launched! Visit the 'More' section of the app to explore the highlights of the 2017/18 Premier League season.

You can now also explore all-time Premier League club, player and manager record-holders through the new 'Records' section in the Stats area.
